p: An important class of natural bioactive compound is represented by polyphenols which are considered secondary metabolites synthesized by plants in their normal development and also as a response to stress factors [ 2]. As polyphenol compounds, flavonoids and phenolic acids are natural antioxidants that have important roles in protecting biological systems against the harmful consequences of oxidative stress. A valuable source of polyphenolic compounds are the plant species from the Asteraceae family [ 3]. Among them, C. intybus, commonly known as chicory is a perennial herb that spontaneously grows from May to October, and is widespread in all regions of Romania but that can be found in cultivated cultures too [ 4, 5].
